description:
Minor material amendment application to vary condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref: P102147 dated 16/12/10 for the: ‘erection of access stair enclosure and balustrades to Peerless Street elevation to facilitate use of the first floor level flat roof as a terrace in association with existing Public House ’.  The minor material amendments are:
A]    alteration in design and materials of balustrade at first floor level.	 
B]    formation of a new internal lobby and alteration in design of stairwell and stair enclosure to gain access to first floor.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 16/12/2013.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 16/12/10  [LBI ref:P102147].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5)
